description: After completing this Project, you can change your specialization to "Mermaid".\n\nSome creatures are blessed with protectors that guard them from harm no matter the cost. The Mermaid relies on her Benthic Guardian to shield her other creatures from danger, ensuring that her allies can fight without fear while her guardian bears the brunt of the enemyâ€™s fury.
name: Specialization: Mermaid
